segments.text: I'd like to reserve a table for three at 6:30 this evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me check . Hold on , please ... Yes , that's fine . Smoking or nonsmoking area ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . May I have your name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you spell it , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2
